title: Did I get SCAMMED by GameStop?
description: Replacement Shell for New Nintendo 3DS XL on Amazon:  Switch Lite Purple Shell on Amazon:  PS5 Retro Darkplates:    By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Ordering from GameStop 2:41 New 3DS XL 4:56 3DS Shell Replacement 6:48 Pokemon 151 7:12 GameSocks 8:15 PS4 Pro 12:01 Switch Lite 14:02 Kirby & Switch Dock 15:14 Steam Deck 17:31 PS5 Digital Edition
